## Option presets

```{r}
#| label: options
#| echo: false
#| eval: true
#| warning: false

options(Seurat.object.assay.calcn = TRUE)
options(renv.config.pak.enabled = TRUE)

```

## Installation

```{r}
#| label: install packages
#| echo: true
#| eval: false

```
